HTMLMediaElementDisableRemotePlayback.summary: The disableRemotePlayback property of the interface determines whether the media element is allowed to have a remote playback UI.

remarks.para:
-The disableremoteplayback attribute of the <audio> element
-The disableremoteplayback attribute of the <video> element

HTMLMediaElementDisableRemotePlayback.value:
A boolean value indicating whether the media element may have a remote playback
UI. (false means "not disabled", which means "enabled")
